Neohire is 100% referral based. All clients are personally vetted and screened. Neohire finds top talent to fill key roles for companies operating across multiple verticals and disciplines in the online space. Our team has filled hundreds of positions that have contributed tens of millions of dollars to our client's bottom lines. We work with leading companies, large and small, providing incredible energy and non-stop commitment to your growth needs. Besides talent, clients can leverage our network for strategic introductions, partnerships, and landscape intelligence.Neohire is not a standard agency. We only take those that want to win and make a difference in the marketplace, and we take a vested interest in their long-term success. Any agency can produce names of qualified people, but it takes a different caliber to find the missing pieces to your puzzle. At Neohire, we pride ourselves on our industry knowledge, deep contacts, and to plug in not just a qualified candidate but the one right for you. We produce not candidates but catalysts.Specializing in the SoCal and NorCal and New York markets, Neohire is a uber-connected and passionate team that consists of some of the best and brightest entrepreneurs and human capital strategists around. We create dedicated, innovative teams for our always growing list of clients who are Los Angeles' top tier VC backed internet and technology start ups. Our client companies have been funded by VCs like Accel Parners, Sequoia Capital, Draper Associates, RedPoint, JMI Equity, and Clearstone.Neohire offers its clients a variety of flexible recruiting solutions to help you scale your business with the highest quality talent available. We are always actively recruiting professionals from the internet space.If you are looking for an experienced team of recruiters and veterans of the internet space to help you grow your team or make your next career move, send me an email Josh@neohire.com or give me a call at 310-388-7051

Neohire Elite is the retained executive search division of Neohire South. Founded in 2004, Neohire South has been building startup teams in the Southern California region for 14 years. Giving us a level of insight and relationship depth that‚Äôs hard to match. For every retained executive search we take on, Neohire Elite takes time to connect with the best advocates of your product, company culture and vision to become evangelists for your company mission. This enable us to differentiate the opportunity to join your team from the flood of inquiries high caliber candidates receive daily.Neohire Elite is NOT a standard retained executive search firm. We are built on the foundation of the relationships we‚Äôve cultivated over the past decade, which is not something we are willing to jeopardize for short term gain. We only make matches that are mutually beneficial to both the candidate and client.
Assisting in the growth of one of the most game changing companies in Los Angeles. Backed my top investors and led by one of the most talented entrepreneurs in the industry.

SimplyBridal is an online retailer that produces high quality and affordable wedding and bridesmaid gowns in regular and plus sizes. All gowns and many accessories, including veils and shawls, are designed in-house. In 2012, SimplyBridal partnered with Los Angeles-based jewelry design May Yeung to release for its line of bridal jewelry. Unlike many traditional bridal boutiques, SimplyBridal makes each dress to order and also offers a high level of customization. The company is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, and its team includes graduates from the best business schools in America, several technologically savvy individuals, and a designer with over twelve years of experience in the fashion industry and a BFA degree in apparel design from the Fashion Institute of Technology.

summary: Hiring C level talent for today's hottest startups. Some include;  CandyClub, FabFitFun, Airmap, Wish, Viking River Cruises, Heal, RomeoPower, Crypt.tv, InAuth, OpenX, Headspace, Matterport, HotelTonight, VowToBeChic, SimplyBridal, Bridg, R2games, Multi Media llc, Victorious and more. Active advisor for multiple startups. Hi! Im Josh. I am someone with an extensive network. I leverage my strong relationships to aid in the incubation and growth and acquisition of many different companies. I structure unique & creative deals for how I work with my clients. In the end, I have a proven track record of helping companies grow. I really love helping scale next generation type companies. In the end, what makes it work is having the ability to connect resources efficiently. When you don't have to waste time and testing, and have the ability to connect and go with the best of the best, things get done, and ideas & companies scale. Feel free to ping me. I love meeting & discovering new ideas. Neohire Inc. is a leading recruiting firm that has contributed to the success and exit of over 52 internet companies over the last 9 years. 18 of which have sold for over $600 Million. We take vested interest in a select handful of companies. Neohire bolts on to hand picked companies to support them through their strategic growth phase. We focus on efficiency, speed and quality. If you wish to reach me, please email: Josh@neohire.com or text 310.882.3759Neohire has offices in Santa Monica, San Francisco and New York. I love to help. I always try to give more than to receive. Please let me know how I can help youSpecialties: Building Companies
